title: Natalie Kutner Palliative Care Creative Arts Therapy Program Fund
description: To provide program development and salary support for a Creative Arts Therapy Program to expand the palliative care programs at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, at the discretion of the fund manager.
marketingContent: To provide program development and salary support for a Creative Arts Therapy Program to expand the palliative care programs at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, at the discretion of the fund manager.
